docs.title: AMBER: Automated annotation and Multimodal Bag Extraction for Robotics
docs.text: Amber is a ROS2 friendly ML tools. Your rosbag2 become dataset!

docs.title: How it works
docs.text:
1. Prepare rosbag2 with mcap format.
  2. Prepare task description yaml file.
  3. Enjyo your ML life with Robots!

docs.title: Check your OS is suppoted platform?
docs.text: This tool is only support ubuntu 22.04. Please install ubuntu 22.04 in your local machine first.

docs.title: Poetry
docs.text:
Setup environment and dependencies in python. Please follow this documentation.

Warning

Developer and github actions are tested under poetry 1.2.0

docs.title: Docker
docs.text:
Some automation tools are executed inside docker. Please follow this documentation.

Notion

Developer use docker version 23.0.5

docs.title: Nvidia driver and nvidia docker(Optional)
docs.text: Some automation tools support cuda. If you want to use gpu, please install nvidia driver and nvidia docker.

docs.title: Google test(Optional)
docs.text:
Google test is a used for testing C++ code inside amber. It is optional and it is not required for building amber in your local machine.

sudo apt update & sudo apt install -y googletest

docs.title: I do not have rosbag2, but I have rosbag (ROS1)
docs.text: This tool can convert your rosbag into rosbag2 very easily.

docs.title: My rosbag is not a mcap format.
docs.text:
You can use ros2 bag convert command. First, you prepare compress.yaml like below.

output_bags:
- uri: rosbag
storage_id: mcap
compression_mode: message
compression_format: zstd
all: true
compression_queue_size: 0
compression_threads: 0

ros2 bag convert -i (PATH_TO_ROSBAG) -o conversion.yaml

docs.title: Automation

docs.title: CLI tools
docs.text: All of the automation tools can be use amber automation command. If you want to check the help text, please type amber automation --help

docs.title: Python API

docs.title: Detic image labaler
docs.text: Detic is a deep learning algorithum developed by facebook research. This tool generate annotation data by using detic. Detic can classify 21k classes.

docs.title: Use with CLI
docs.text:
Warning

This sample command is written with the assumption that it will be executed in the root directory of the amber package.

amber automation detic_image_labeler tests/detic_image_labeler.yaml tests/read_image_ford.yaml tests/rosbag/ford/ford.mcap output.mcap

Task description yaml for the detic_image_labaler is here.

confidence_threshold: 0.5      # If the confidence overs the threshold, detic determines the object are exists.
video_output_path: output.mp4  # Relative path to the visualization result.
docker_config:                 # Docker configuration
use_gpu: false               # If true, run with CUDA

After executing this command, output.mp4 movie file was generated.

docs.title: Use with Python API
docs.text:
current_path = Path(os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__)))
labeler = DeticImageLabeler(str(current_path / "detic_image_labeler.yaml"))
dataset = Rosbag2Dataset(
    str(current_path / "rosbag" / "ford" / "ford.mcap"),
    str(current_path / "read_image_ford.yaml"),
)
labeler.inference(dataset)

detic_image_labeler.yaml and read_image_ford.yaml are exactly same when you use detic_image_labaler with CLI.

After executing this command, output.mp4 movie file was generated.

docs.title: Video
docs.text: Video import tool can convert video files into rosbag. Currently, only *.mp4 file types are supported.

docs.title: Use with CLI
docs.text:
Warning

This sample command is written with the assumption that it will be executed in the root directory of the amber package.

amber import video tests/video/soccer_goal.mp4 tests/video_importer.yaml

If you want to know the option, please run amber import video -h command.

example of the inporter config is here.

topic_name: /camera/image_raw
rosbag_path: output.mcap

docs.title: Use with Python API
docs.text:
current_path = Path(os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__)))
importer = VideoImporter(
    str(current_path / "video" / "soccer_goal.mp4"),
    str(current_path / "video_importer.yaml"),
)
importer.write()

docs.title: Prepare rosbag data
docs.text:
Warning

Currently, some limitations are exists. rosbag2 should be mcap format. only zstd message compression supports.

docs.title: Use rosbag as dataset
docs.text:
Rosbag includes multimodal data, such as image/pointcloud/audio/etc... So, you need to describe what data you want to extract from rosbag. In order to specify this, write yaml setting file.

dataset = Rosbag2Dataset("(path to rosbag .mcap file)", "(path to rosbag yaml description file)")

If you want to know wahat types of task amber supports, please check task description section in this document.

docs.title: Read Images
docs.text:
In image_only task, Rosbag2Dataset Class provides only image data. Example task description yaml file is here.

dataset_type: image_only
image_topics:
- topic_name: /wamv/sensors/cameras/front_left_camera_sensor/image_raw
compressed: true
- topic_name: /wamv/sensors/cameras/front_right_camera_sensor/image_raw
